top_rare_diseases.overview: A rare genetic disorder characterized by kidney disease, hearing loss, and eye abnormalities.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Genetic mutations in the COL4A3, COL4A4, or COL4A5 genes
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Genetic testing, kidney biopsy, hearing tests, and eye exams
top_rare_diseases.treatment: Medications to manage symptoms, dialysis or kidney transplant in advanced cases

top_rare_diseases.overview: A rare kidney disease characterized by scarring of the glomeruli.

top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Kidney biopsy, blood tests, and urine tests
top_rare_diseases.treatment: Medications to manage symptoms, immunosuppressants, and dialysis or kidney transplant in advanced cases
